name: Deserted (Cooper Saye)
description:
Forage, build, and innovate on your new island. OST included in purchase.

  • 5 music track OST included in .mp3 and .ogg formats
  • seeded random island generation
  • 49 crafting recipes from 7 research branches
  • terraforming, building, fishing, farming, machinery, and more
  • dynamic nature and ambience
  • 3 buildings with modifiable interiors

A creative, ambient survival game. I hope it provides you a relaxing experience.
